Description:
From brewery to brilliant.
The transition from the evocative industrial origins of the Yorkshire Brewery precinct to the residential brilliance of a city edge address is perfectly illustrated by this highly desirable dual level townhouse. A traditional period façade, instantly reflective of its Victorian era, creates an elegant introduction to superb spaces including a downstairs living and dining area framed by stylish timber floors and handsome ceiling beams. An open plan kitchen featuring marble benches, integrated storage, concealed fridge and Miele appliances makes a memorable contribution to these perfectly private dimensions while alluring accommodation defines the upper level. Two bedrooms and two bathrooms, including a main bedroom with walk in robes to a seductive ensuite, are irresistibly appealing. The downstairs powder room, excellent storage and secure garaging for two cars further complement inner city environs offering a gym, library and barbeque deck.
Insights: 16 Waterloo Road, Collingwood VIC 3066 was last sold in 2018 and 29 other 2 bedroom house in Collingwood have recently been sold.

Description:
Cosmopolitan Living at Parkview Heights
Blessed with great natural light, this first floor apartment in an exclusive block of 6, certainly ticks the boxes.
Showcasing generous proportions throughout, the residence features an impressive open plan living/dining, double bedroom with robes, kitchen/meals with stainless steel gas cooking, wood block bench and ensuite bathroom.
Combining security entrance, intercom system, split system heating/cooling and convenient car park on title.
Fantastic urban location, taking full advantage of the excitement that is Smith and Gertrude Street, parkland, riverside bike trails and CBD.
Insights: 4/66 Perry Street, Collingwood VIC 3066 was last sold in 2018 and 49 other 1 bedroom unit in Collingwood have recently been sold.

Description:
INNER CITY LIVING AT ITS BEST
Very spacious and superbly presented 3 bedroom townhouse style apartment in a quiet but convenient location in a boutique block of 8 close to all forms of both community and physical infrastructure including public transport, cafes, restaurants and bars, shops and schools.
Many features include:
- Large light filled living and dining area with timber floors
- Well appointed gas kitchen with ample cupboards and bench space
- Extra large main Bedroom with walk in robe plus
- 2 other double Bedrooms with BIRS
- Full Ensuite to master bedroom plus 2nd stylish bathroom
- Private outdoor terrace & BBQ Area
- Secure car park, storage locker and more
Insights: 18 other 3 bedroom unit in Collingwood have recently been sold.

Description:
SIZE it uP!
When size & location matters
Rare HUGE 60 square metre one bedroom student apartment or investment bordering prestigious East Melbourne.
Near the Fitzroy gardens only moments from Australia Catholic University or just a stroll to RMIT a lot of travelling time is saved.
This would be ideal simply for comfort over a long period of the uni years.
A first floor unit in the quiet end of the landmark classic period Cambridge Court building.
Relax on the rooftop terrace alfresco area with stunning views basking studying or gazing.
Enjoy the space with high ceilings, a generous open plan living/dining and kitchen area, a spacious double bedroom and a good size tiled bathroom.
So well located and serviced with public transport and the convenience of a supermarket and Smith Street shops nearby.
Insights: 308/45 Victoria Parade, Collingwood VIC 3066 was last sold in 2017 and 49 other 1 bedroom unit in Collingwood have recently been sold.

Description:
Chic pad in one of Melbourne's most popular locales
North facing, perfectly positioned and walking distance to some of Melbourne's best bar & dining precincts such as Gertrude, Smith & Brunswick Streets. This property will forever be attractive to both investors & owner occupiers looking to secure outstanding returns or long-term capital growth.
Bathed in natural light this apartment also features:
• Generous living/dining that opens out on to a sunny spacious balcony
• Separated galley style kitchen with an abundance of storage
• Reverse cycle heating and cooling
• Extra storage on title
• Underground secure car park & security swipe access with intercom
• Public transport at your door
• On-site building manager
Collingwood living has a flavor all of its own, secure your slice today!
To view the statement of information visit: http://melbournecity.harcourts.com.au/Home/Buy/statement-of-information
Harcourts Melbourne City suggests that all buyers read the due diligence checklist available on our website:
http://melbournecity.harcourts.com.au/Home/Buy/Due-diligence-checklist
Please find a full copy of our privacy policy on our website: http://melbournecity.harcourts.com.au/Home/Contact-Us/Privacy-Policy
Insights: 209/40 Stanley Street, Collingwood VIC 3066 was last sold in 2018 and 83 other 2 bedroom unit in Collingwood have recently been sold.

Description:
The place to be! Stylish & secure cafe precinct living
Stroll to Collingwood's renowned cafe scene from this light-filled ground floor apartment in the acclaimed Gibson/Oxley development, with second secure entry from Napoleon Street. A perfect CBD home or astute investment, this sunny residence comprises an open-plan living/dining area and well-equipped kitchen flowing to a covered patio, double bedroom (BIRs) and adjoining study/guest BR, plus stylish bathroom/laundry with walk-in shower. Including basement parking and access to shared outdoor living space/pool, this hip apartment features split-system air conditioning, quality fittings and intercom.
Insights: 49 other 1 bedroom unit in Collingwood have recently been sold.

Description:
Californian charm with corner credentials
Set on a substantial corner block complete with ROW, this freestanding home provides an immediately functional city-edge lifestyle with a myriad of options to modernize/extend or possibly develop (STCA) in a prized Fitzroy-edge location. Retaining all its period charm, the home's current floorplan comprises 2 genuinely large bedrooms, dedicated study area and central bathroom, elegant lounge, separate dining room and adjoining kitchen. Add to this gas heating, high ornate ceilings, lead-light windows, plus a sizeable backyard with extensive brick paving, secure carport (via Emma St) and plenty of room to expand. Smith Street trams virtually at your doorstep, it's also walking distance to endless cafes, bars and restaurants, as well as shops and supermarkets, local parks and schools.
Insights: 3 Mater Street, Collingwood VIC 3066 was last sold in 2017 and 29 other 2 bedroom house in Collingwood have recently been sold.

Description:
"TOORA"
Full of surprises, this semi-detached Victorian gem delivers an outstanding environment of quality and style with its impressively-proportioned interior, long list of enhancements and easy access to the best of Collingwood. Wider than most single-fronts, the home comprises 2 generous bedrooms (both with robes) and updated bathroom, wide central lounge through to the open living/meals area and adjoining kitchen with dishwasher and tiled splashbacks. Other features include ducted heating and split-system a/c, high ceilings, polished timber floors and ladder access to attic storage, plus a wonderfully private back garden with brick paving and handy storage shed. Walking distance to everything that counts including cafes and restaurants, public transport options, shopping precincts, as well as Yarra trails and parkland.
Insights: 4 Forest Street, Collingwood VIC 3066 was last sold in 2017 and 29 other 2 bedroom house in Collingwood have recently been sold.

Description:
Bold, Beautiful and Perfectly Placed
Impressive architecture, designer details and first-class features illustrate the appeal of this brand-new townhouse (one of only three) delivering a sensational executive lifestyle of quality, privacy and inner-city ease. Bathed in natural light, the home's multi-level interior showcases two double bedrooms (both with built-in robes) and two full bathrooms of equal quality and class. Add to this a separate lounge and open dining/living area leading out to an impressively large wrap-around terrace ideal for relaxing and entertaining. Other highlights include a superb contemporary kitchen with stainless steel cooking appliances and dishwasher, split-system heating and cooling, plush carpets, timber floors, LED lighting, full-size laundry, plus alarm system, private/secure entrance and internally-accessed garage (r/c) via Little Abbot Street. Easey access to Smith Street cafes and trams, renowned restaurants and bars, vibrant shopping precincts, as well as river trails, Victoria Park Station and choice of bus routes. Inner-urban lifestyle perfection!
Insights: 29 other 2 bedroom house in Collingwood have recently been sold.

Description:
Be Enticed by Something Different…
One of the more attractive attributes of Collingwood lies in its diversity and this home proves a wonderful alternative to your obligatory terrace which is the mainstay of the suburb’s somewhat eclectic & vibrant streetscape. Generous in its accommodation this contemporary gem (built 1982) is infinitely comfortable as is however time is near for an update to the kitchen & bathroom which are ‘tired’ and require reinvigoration. The home’s scope to improve, sublime location and uniqueness should without doubt excite the devoted inner city dweller…
Offering 2 sizeable bedrooms (Huge Master bedroom!), vast open plan lounge with parquetry floor, adjacent formal dining, functional but dated kitchen, split level bathroom/laundry, front & rear courtyards and vehicle access to a single carport from Easey Street. Whether your passion is the café culture, the multitude of fine eateries or simply being on the edge of Melbourne’s CBD this is lifestyle central… Enjoy!
Insights: 34 Gold Street, Collingwood VIC 3066 was last sold in 2017 and 29 other 2 bedroom house in Collingwood have recently been sold.

Description:
Easey As It Gets
Situated in a small block of only six apartments, surrounded by popular lifestyle options and just moments from vibrant Smith Street restaurants, bars, shops and trams, this classic ground floor one bedroom apartment boasts a light-filled interior with a spacious living room that leads to the large private leafy courtyard with storage shed, updated kitchen with meals area, modern bathroom with laundry facilities, BIRs, polished timber floors and OSP on title. This true inner-northerner is spoilt with convenience and makes for an ideal entry to the market for first home buyers or astute investors alike.

Description:
Impressive style in a prime position
With its quality enhancements, boutique surrounds (1 of only 6) and unbeatable inner-city convenience, this ground-floor Parkview Heights apartment ticks all the boxes for first-time buyers and savvy investors alike. Inside, discover an oasis of quality and privacy boasting one extra-large bedroom (with full-width robes) and modern ensuite bathroom, spacious open lounge complemented by an updated kitchen with breakfast bar. Add to this, new carpets throughout, wonderfully private courtyard complete with handy storage shed, plus off-street parking space. Easy living or blue-chip investing, it's walking distance to Smith Street trams, Johnston Street buses and Victoria Park Station, along with the area's trendy cafes and bars, renowned restaurants, boutique shops and major supermarkets.

Description:
First Home Buyers Dream Pad!
Renovated two-bedroom apartment, bathed in natural light with floor to ceiling East facing windows is sure to impress.
Securely located on the first floor this open plan home comprises:
• Stylish Open plan kitchen/dining
• Large open plan living area opening onto your private outdoor terrace
• Two large bedrooms with BIR's
• Central bathroom & separate European laundry
• Split System Heating & Cooling
Perfectly located with easy walking to Victoria Park Railway Station, Yarra River Walking tracks & all that Johnston Street offers including cafes, shopping & tram make this perfect for downsizers / investors & First Home Buyers alike.
Investors Note: Potential Rental of $500 - $520 per week.

Description:
Classic Victorian with Modern Appeal
Sitting in a premium Collingwood position, this single fronted Victorian cottage is bursting with character and charm. Offering 2 large bedrooms, a central renovated bathroom (separate bath) and large updated kitchen overlooking living/dining which opens to sun-drenched private courtyard garden and deck - simply perfect for entertaining. Featuring rear lane access, timber floorboards, high ceilings, alarm & hydronic heating. Set in an attractive row of charming Victorians and all just a short walk from Gertrude & Smith Street, Victoria Streets cafes, restaurants, shopping and transport plus East Melbourne Parks/Gardens and the MCG.

Outstanding Investment Opportunity - currently returning $480 per week
In a boutique complex designed by renowned architects Elenberg Fraser, this 2nd-floor Oxley apartment delivers an idyllic inner-city lifestyle/investment with its quality features, secure surrounds and unbeatable convenience. Elevated and filled with northerly light, the apartment's stylish interior comprises one double bedroom (BIRs) and dedicated study/home office, stylish bathroom, open living/dining area flanked by floor-to-ceiling windows out to an undercover terrace with neighbourhood views. Add to this a well-appointed kitchen, heating and cooling, intercom and secure entry, plus undercover parking space and storage cage. In a prime Fitzroy-edge location moments from Smith Street cafe culture and city-bound trams, as well as popular green spaces, shops and supermarkets all close by.

Description:
Boutique city style with elevated views
Spacious floorplan, fine features and boutique surrounds highlights the allure of this two-level townhouse tucked away in a secure complex (1 of only 19) along with impressive views and unmatched city-edge convenience. Clever design boasts 2 double bedrooms (both with BIRs) and 2 stylish bathrooms (one on each level), light-filled open living/dining area leading out to a large terrace ideal for entertaining and enjoying the city vista. Add to this stone-bench kitchen with stainless steel cooking appliances and dishwasher, split-system heating and cooling, European laundry, plus intercom/secure entry foyer, lower-level parking space and large storage cage. Easy access to the best of Collingwood including Smith Street trams, cafes and shops, Alexandra Parade buses and Victoria Park Station.

Description:
Ultra-modern lifestyle opportunity - approx. 95sqm
Tucked away in a secluded cul-de-sac yet moments from the buzz of Smith Street, this sensational two-level apartment has it all - modern style, absolute quality, two car spaces and fabulous views. In a boutique block of only 14, the apartment's light-filled interior comprises two double bedrooms (both with robes, one with balcony) and dedicated study area, deluxe bathroom, stone-bench kitchen with all-Bosch appliances, open-plan living/dining area out to a full-width terrace. Other features include split-system a/c, quality carpets and timber flooring, lift access, undercover parking and storage cage, plus a fabulous residents' rooftop deck to relax/entertain and enjoy the views.
Insights: 301/44 Bedford Street, Collingwood VIC 3066 was last sold in 2017 and 83 other 2 bedroom unit in Collingwood have recently been sold.

Description:
Central and secluded with amazing space
In a boutique complex tucked away behind the iconic Collingwood Post Office, this sensational apartment sets itself apart with its oversized interior, serene surrounds and instant access to the best of Collingwood and Fitzroy. Corner position for an abundance of natural light, the home's impressive design highlights 3 bedrooms (large master) all with BIRs, stylish ensuite and main bathroom, vast open-plan living/dining area leading out to a wide undercover terrace. Add to this a stone-top kitchen with Blanco appliances, split-system heating/cooling (2 units), plus intercom/secure entry (via grand Post Office foyer) and lift access to 2 lower-level car spaces. The world at your doorstep including boutique shops and major supermarkets, cheap eats and gourmet feasts, trams to the CBD.
Insights: 12/176 Smith Street, Collingwood VIC 3066 was last sold in 2017 and 18 other 3 bedroom unit in Collingwood have recently been sold.

Description:
A NYC state of style & sophistication
Resonating with an irresistible New York narrative of style and sophistication, this brilliant warehouse apartment spectacularly unfolds from vast sky-lit entry to beautifully renovated interior in a buzzing lifestyle locale. Secured towards the rear of a coveted Foy & Gibson complex including basement car space on title; enjoy 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom multi-level living then step out onto the street and be immersed in an exciting mix of cafes, restaurants, bars, galleries and boutiques. Superbly integrating strong heritage character in a sublime contemporary context, this one-owner home includes main bedroom with ensuite, study nook, high-ceiling living and dining, stunning new Caesarstone concrete kitchen, laundry, original exposed beams, new carpet and polished hardwood floors, plus ample storage.
Insights: 13/76 Oxford Street, Collingwood VIC 3066 was last sold in 2017 and 83 other 2 bedroom unit in Collingwood have recently been sold.
